timeline.message: [APMJAVA-468] added unit tests for Quartz instrumentation
[JAVAAPM-468] Refactored Quartz instrumentation to remove unnecessary tags
[JAVAAPM-468] Refactored Quartz instrumentation to remove unnecessary tags
Change Quartz module name to reflect lowest version
Fixed quartz directory naming, added spotlessApply
increased test limit for string table

timeline.bodyText: Are there common ways to use quartz that would bypass this mechanism? (For example, is a job still created if quartz is configured via xml.)
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: I think the way jobs are specified is pretty consistent so it is unlikely that there is an exception. I will also add a test for this to verify it against XML configs, to be extra careful.
replies.author: kevinfwl

timeline.message: added test for XML config, fixed latestDepTest version
added test for propagation, increased time interval between jobs
add job scheduling to run under trace

timeline.bodyText: @andrewsouthard1 do you have opinions on what the operation name for this should be?  I'm thinking quartz.execute, job.execute, or scheduled.execute might be better.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: What does spring scheduling do today or other schedulers? If we have a consistency my thought is we stick to that.
replies.author: andrewsouthard1

replies.bodyText: Looks like we use scheduled.call in spring scheduling, so perhaps replace with that?
replies.author: tylerbenson

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to associate it with a method name too or will it always be just execute?
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: I believe for Quartz, it will always be execute since all Job classes have to implement the function.
replies.author: kevinfwl

timeline.bodyText: Update the field name too please...
timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.bodyText: Do you think this will be useful to users?
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: I was thinking it might help uniquely identify a scheduler if multiple scheduler instances are running. On second thought, it shouldn't be too important.
replies.author: kevinfwl

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure this comment is accurate.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.bodyText: I think these should be removed.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.message: ensure a new trace is created per job
